Name: The Watch
Details: The Watch is the intelligence agency of the Clans. Its most recent iteration is directly descended from Intelser and was loosely organized at the start of the Clan Invasion on the order of ilKhan Leo Showers. Though nominally the intelligence service for all of the Clans and headed by the Loremaster of the Clans, each individual Clan runs their own independent branch headed by their respective Loremaster.
